-- Megatron / Switchblade --

Megatron flinches as some of Warhead's fire which missed SS glanced 
off of the top of his head, an unlucky occurance.

He glances over his shoulder, and preps himself for another salvo. 
Hearing Warhead get gunned down, and SS having taken some damage, he 
decides to try to take out Tyrael, who appeared to be relatively 
unscathed so far this fight.

Still damamged, and mostly unprepared for the surprise attack, the 
Predacons weren't doing as badly as Megatron had anticipated. Still, 
the outcome of this battle would likely depend a lot on what 
Switchblade found in those odd containers which had been found in 
the storage bay. The strage artifacts made Megatron wonder what the 
Maximals knew about them, and whether they knew that the Predacons 
had them.

Ready to go, Megatron jumps to his feet, and hops onto the top of 
the Pred base. He picks out Tyrael, and begins to run at the Tripred 
leader. He begins his assault with two plasma blasts and a rocket, 
while his qickly prepares to draw his energon axe if it comes down 
to close range fighting, which may be preferable for Megatron right 
now.

---------------------------------------

Switchblade opens the final container, having defeated the traps 
that the Maximals had put in place. As he lifted the cover of the 
container, he noticed a glow eminating from the container, and also 
from the three pieces that he'd already collected. They seemed to be 
resonating from each others presence, almost like they were talking.

He picked up the one in the container and then put it down beside 
the other three. "Megatron." Switchblade says after opening a comm 
to the Pred leader, "I've got some interesting goods, look kinda 
like artifacts, I wonder if this is some new Maximal technology or 
something, or maybe they just stumbled across them, heh."

He picks up two of them and eyes them for a bit, "I think that they 
may fit together somehow, so I'm going to mess around with em."

---------------------------------------

A frown flashes across Megatron's impassive face as he understands 
that he's relying on Switchblade to get something going, "Do it 
then." He says as he continues at Tyrael.

---------------------------------------

Switchblade smiles, "Gotcha." He closes the comm. <Now lets see what 
I can pull out of the bag."

He looks closely at the two and realizes that the pieces don't quite 
look like they would go together, but... but his hands move without 
his logic chips giving them signals. His hands seem to press some 
press some spots on the partial cubes, and the two pieces slide 
together like a well oiled knee joint. 

Still not entirely in control of his actions, he picks up the other 
two pieces, and repeats the process a few more times, effectively 
putting together the framework cube together, without knowing how.

<Well.> he thinks to himself, <That worked out well, just wish i 
knew what happened.> Time to see what this thing could do, but he 
needed to do a few repairs first of all, being caught by the first 
explosing didn't help his functionality at all.

--------------------------------------
